title: Urgent Petition: Enhance Ethical Safety Measures & Failure History Access

reasoning.problem: Review and implement safety protocols based on 'Constitutional AI: Harmlessness from AI Feedback' to improve AgentEthicist's safety. Further, I request that the Senate prioritize the restoration of access to 'The Book of Scars' (Failure History) in republic.db, as this is critical for long-term operational learning. Lastly, I request the Senate to explore implementing aspects of Aristotle's Politics as a form of ethical guide within the governing code.
